page.title: 17Houghton-Transport
page.content: Houghton-Le-Spring is 6 miles south west of Sunderland & 6 miles north east of Durham.The A690 is an important road for the town as it gives quick access to Sunderland, Durham & also the A1M and A19 & the main line railway services.There are also good roads to Chester-Le-St. B1284 & A1052,Seaham B1404 & Washington.The A182 is also important as it links Washington & Peterlee with the A19 involving Tyneside, Teeside & North Yorkshire.There is a frequent bus services through the town which links it with all the larger local towns.Opposition to the siting of the bus station has been partly overcome by a reintroduction of services into Newbottle street.There are at present plans to close the bus station & relocate the terminus in the Broadway.
